title: Hux Flux - Division By Zero (2003) [FLAC]
description:
Division by Zero is the second full-length album from psychedelic trance producers Hux Flux.
The track "Numbers" features a sample from the film Pi.
Track listing

"Numbers" (7:28)
"Ultrastructure" (6:53)
"Bitshifter" (6:53)
"Skurk" (7:24)
"Artifacts" (7:29)
"Tabulator" (7:56)
"Telex 44 / Null" (8:37)
"Numerous Numerics" (7:21)
"Postpone the Phone" (7:10)

Today, Hux Flux is a solo musician starring the Swede Dennis Tapper. His style is an unusual blend of psychedelic trance and goa trance.
